pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phase Error Correction and Baseline Correction for One Dimensional ('1D') 'NMR' Data // There are three distinct approaches for phase error correction, they are: a single linear model with a choice of optimization functions, multiple linear models with optimization function choices and a shrinkage-based method. The methodology is based on our new algorithms and various references (Binczyk et al. (2015) doi:10.1186/1475-925X-14-S2-S5,Chen et al. (2002) doi:10.1016/S1090-7807(02)00069-1, de Brouwer (2009) doi:10.1016/j.jmr.2009.09.017, Dakula (2000) doi:10.1006/jmre.2000.2123, Ernst (1969) doi:10.1016/0022-2364(69)90003-1, Liland et al. (2010) doi:10.1366/000370210792434350).
